trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented by layouts which host <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
Returns a collection of bounding rectangles for a child element.
The child element that the bounding rectangles are returned for.
A collection of bounding rectangles for a child element.

If the element is not a direct descendant (i.e. element must be a child of the <xref href="System.Windows.IContentHost"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> which is a direct descendant of the <xref href="System.Windows.IContentHost"></xref>).

Gets an enumeration containing all descendant <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>-derived classes, as well as all <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>-derived classes that are a direct descendant of the <xref href="System.Windows.IContentHost"></xref> or one of its descendant <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> classes.

Enumeration containing all descendant <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>-derived classes, as well as all <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>-derived classes that are a direct descendant of the <xref href="System.Windows.IContentHost"></xref> or one of its descendant <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> classes.

In other words, elements for which the <xref href="System.Windows.IContentHost"></xref> creates a visual representation (<xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>-derived classes) or whose layout is driven by the <xref href="System.Windows.IContentHost"></xref> (the first-level descendant <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>-derived classes).
Mouse coordinates relative to the ContentHost.
A descendant of <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref>, or **NULL** if no such element exists.

Called when a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>-derived class which is hosted by a <xref href="System.Windows.IContentHost"></xref> changes its <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize*>.

If *child* is not a direct descendant (i.e. *child* must be a child of the <xref href="System.Windows.IContentHost"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> which is a direct descendant of the <xref href="System.Windows.IContentHost"></xref>).
